data.title: Private Equity and Private Credit Investments
data.meta_description: Find certificates and finance courses provided by CFA Institute to further your career in the investment industry. Acquire new skills and certifications.
data.text:
This course offers a high-level and engaging introduction to private equity and private credit investments. You will learn about the features, investment characteristics, risk and return profiles, and diversification benefits of private equity and private credit investments. Expand your knowledge about the fund structures, terms, due diligence process, and how to interpret the financial performance of private equity and private credit investments.

Course modules include:

Module 1: Introduction to Private Equity and Private Credit Investments

Module 2: Private Equity Investments

Module 3: Private Credit Investments

Module 4: Practitioner Perspectives
